data.text: @ashlyferg @lyntonmanuel “Golden Child”🤣     Don’t know their wine but willlook out for it now

@GMartlow @lyntonmanuel I’m definitely not the black sheep. I’m the golden child 😂 

It’s a Hugh Hamilton glass. We love ❤️ ❤️❤️ their wine.
@ashlyferg @lyntonmanuel Nice glass👍 Are you your families one?
@lyntonmanuel yes, hold onto that thought!!!! 🤞 I've had a few friends who have avoided it despite being surrounded by family who have it, so let's hope that's you too
@MicheCaldwell Still testing negative. Not sure how, with my wife coughing and spluttering, but hey… I’ll go with that… https://t.co/9RnmwmAuNU
@MicheCaldwell Kids are much better now which is great. 😊
@lyntonmanuel How are the kids? Feeling any better?

@lyntonmanuel Cheers mate 🍷 
I’m happy too ➖ 🐀 

(Testing before clinic tomorrow and having the normal ➕cases pop up here and there around me but so far so good for me). 

Stay sane. https://t.co/sMduKn9lMu
